instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3476-A (Orange Light , no fan spin, no power on, no chime)
threads.message:
Good Day guys, another board in for no power, no display no chime. Will not power off battery or charger, only orange light appears on led. (No battery plugged in)

Ive taken the following measurements for now.

PP3V42_G3H = 3.42V

PPBUS_G3H = 12.6

PP5V1_CHGR_VDD = 5.5V

PPDCIN_G3H - 16.7V

CHGR_ACIN = 3.93

u7100 pin 27/28 20.5 Ohms , on pin 17/18 :4.2 Ohms

pin 27/28 16.07v

U7100 
1) 3.2MV
2) 16.5V
3) 3.9V
4) 2.58V
5) 1.42V
6) 3.4V
7) 1.08V
8) 2.11V

threads.message: History? Check for power cycling on 5V_S4
